participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, Margaret enjoys sharing stories and experiences with others.
participant_1.background: I'm worried about how we're going to make ends meet on one income. I like to eat sushi when I'm not at the archery center. I enjoy spending time with my grandchildren and sister, reading, and gardening. I'd brag about my extensive book collection, which is filled with all the classics and some hidden gems. I like going to Canada.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and adventurous, Jake loves to entertain and share his experiences with others.
participant_2.background: I am not really concerned with my appearance, as I spend most of my time on the farm. I remember playing with my cat in the backyard all day long. I love living in Texas. I start working with my brother-in-law in Hollywood. I work in a circus as a juggler.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I am a juggler in a circus. I am also a farmer.
Wow, that is amazing! I would love to see a show!
Come to Texas, I will give you a free ticket.
Oh that would be so much fun! I would love to see you perform.
Great! I am also a big reader, do you like to read?
I love to read! I am currently reading a book called "the great gatsby".
That is one of my favorite books! I loved reading it.
I am about halfway through it and I am really enjoying it so far.
It is a great book! I am glad you are enjoying it.
Do you have any other favorite books?
I love the hunger games series.
I have heard great things about that series, I have been meaning to read it.
You should! It is a great series
